lines: they are photo safe and will not stain walls like putties.
scotch® reusable tabs, r100-c-24pk, 1 in (2.54 cm), 24 per pack
scotch® reusable tabs, r100-c-24pk, 25.4 mm x 25.4 mm
scotch® reusable tabs are pre-cut squares of clear, reusable and removable adhesive
these tabs are ideal for light weight mounting, specifically, photos, posters, artwork or papers on walls, office cabinets, refrigerators, windows, etc
